content: DD 120 Core drill Extremely compact, light and mobile diamond coring machine for rig-based concrete coring from 16-162 mm (5/8 - 6-3/8) in diameter ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Diamond coring- - - ### FEATURES:Features Exceptionally user-friendly thanks to intuitively-designed features and controls Compact and lightweight concrete core drill – for much easier handling Two-speed gearing for optimum speed and torque Power control LED – shows even inexperienced users how to achieve the optimum drilling speed and maximize core bit life Hilti BI+ quick-release connection lets you change core bits in seconds – no tools required (keyless system) Applications Installing pipes for sanitary, heating and air conditioning Installing water supply and waste water pipes Making openings for cable trays Setting large-diameter anchors and reinforcing bars Installing railings and barriers For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Diameter range: 5/8 - 6-3/8 in Base material: Concrete Operation mode: Rig-based drilling system Technical Data | Diameter range | 5/8 - 6-3/8 in | Base material | Concrete | Operation mode | Rig-based drilling system | Number of gears | 2 | No load RPM | gear 1: 740 rpm; gear 2: 1580 rpm | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 23.1 lb | Weight of complete system | 23 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 12.9 x 5.8 x 13 in | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 89 dB (A) | 1 | Tri. vibr. value for drilling into concrete (wet) with diamond core A (ah,DD) | 2.5 m/s² | Tri. vibr. value for drilling into concrete (wet) (ah,DD) - Corebit A | PS/PL | Corner accessibility | 1.9 in | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3604583 - DD 120 Complete Core Rig with Kit Box - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 120 120V Diamond coring tool - 1x Drilling stand DD-ST 120 SFM - 1x DD 120 Tool case assy
